meanings.definition: A stone believed to have magical properties, often worn as an amulet.
meanings.sent1: The toadstones around her neck glowed softly in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: She kept a toadstone in her pocket for good luck.
meanings.sent3: The toadstones whispered secrets to each other when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His toadstones seemed to hold the mysteries of the universe within them.
meanings.sent5: The toadstones shimmered with an otherworldly aura, captivating all who gazed upon them.

meanings.definition: A stone resembling a toad, believed to have medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The toadstones in the old tale were said to cure any ailment.
meanings.sent2: Children collected toadstones from the riverbank, hoping for their healing powers.
meanings.sent3: The toadstones hopped away when the doctor tried to use them for medicine.
meanings.sent4: Her toadstones exuded a healing energy that soothed all who touched them.
meanings.sent5: The toadstones seemed to pulse with life, promising health and vitality to those in need.

meanings.definition: A stone used in jewelry or as a talisman.
meanings.sent1: She wore toadstones on a silver chain around her wrist.
meanings.sent2: The toadstones sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The toadstones on his ring seemed to wink mischievously at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her toadstones were like tiny guardians, protecting her from harm.
meanings.sent5: The toadstones seemed to hum with a protective energy, shielding her from any danger.
